A '''sculk patch''' is a [[feature]] that places [[sculk catalyst]]s and [[sculk shrieker]]s in patches in the [[deep dark]] biome.

=== Config ===

{{main|Configured feature}}
{{el|java}}:
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
{{nbt|compound|config}}
** {{Nbt|int|charge_count}} The number of charges. Value between 1 and 32 (inclusive).
** {{Nbt|int|amount_per_charge}} The initial value of each charge. Value between 1 and 500 (inclusive).
** {{Nbt|int|spread_attempts}} The number of attempts to spread. Value between 1 and 64 (inclusive).
** {{Nbt|int|growth_rounds}} The number of times to generate. Value between 0 and 8 (inclusive).
** {{Nbt|int|spread_rounds}} The number of times to spread. Value between 0 and 8 (inclusive).
** {{Nbt|int}}{{Nbt|compound|extra_rare_growths}} The number of extra shriekers generated.
*** {{Nbt inherit/int provider}}
** {{Nbt|float|catalyst_chance}} The probability of generating a catalyst. Value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|outerstyle=margin: 0.5rem 0|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:sculk_patch",
  "config": {
    "amount_per_charge": 32,
    "catalyst_chance": 0.5,
    "charge_count": 10,
    "extra_rare_growths": {
      "type": "minecraft:uniform",
      "value": {
        "max_inclusive": 3,
        "min_inclusive": 1
      }
    },
    "growth_rounds": 0,
    "spread_attempts": 64,
    "spread_rounds": 1
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
{{Collapse|tail=1}}
